page.title: 11Transport in Stafford.
page.content: The Mini Bus Service in Stafford started on 10th May 1985, mainly to service the community better, especially the old. It was hoped that people would be more ready to use the buses if they came to their doorstep. The colours, red and yellow were chosen because they are colours people would not fail to notice. The fare at present for travelling from Wildwood into Stafford is 40p return for children and 75p for adults. O.A.P.'s have a reduced rate. Although there are 9 Mini Buses, only 8 are on service, 1 in reserve. Mini Buses can go down small streets which the bigger buses cannot. They cost 13000 pounds each and seat 16 people and 5 standing.
